elements.label: Redirect to this page when the page url is accessed. For example, if this page's url is "/currentuser", then the JSON file will be "/currentuser.json". If someone visits /currentuser only, they will be redirected to the page set in this option.

elements.info: This Kajabi helper theme allows you to get the current user information to be used for client-side scripting. It only sends user information of the logged in user.
